definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g

sentences.english: The dog's height should not exceed 40 cm, weight 10 kg.
sentences.chinese: 狗的身高不能超过40厘米，体重在10公斤以下。

sentences.english: One consequence of this is a reduction in the GHG cost of production per kilo of product.
sentences.chinese: 一个结果是生产每公斤产品的温室气体代价的减少。

sentences.english: How heavy are you? I'm 48 kg.
Eg. 1345 kilograms force was applied at the center point of the bar.
sentences.chinese: 试验时，在杆的中点加了1345公斤力。

sentences.english: Old women were rationed to 14 kilograms of grain a month.
sentences.chinese: 对老年妇女每个月配给粮食14公斤。

sentences.english: In one hour , it can shell about 56 kilograms of peanuts.
sentences.chinese: 一小时它大约能为56公斤花生去壳。

sentences.english: How can a soldier be expected to fight when he is required to carry several dozen kilogrammes?
sentences.chinese: 现在一个战士要背几十公斤，怎么打仗呀？

sentences.english: The first man-made satellite of our country weighs 173 kilogrammes.
sentences.chinese: 我国第一颗人造卫星重173公斤。

sentences.english: This basis is the amount of carbon dioxide generated per kilogramme of packaging material.
sentences.chinese: 这依据是二氧化碳的含量每公斤的包装材料产生的。

sentences.english: She succeeded in reducing her weight from 60 kilos to 50 kilos.
sentences.chinese: 她成功地将体重从60公斤减到50公斤。

sentences.english: She succeeded in reducing her weight from 60 kilos to 50 kilos.
sentences.chinese: 她成功地将体重从60公斤减到50公斤。

sentences.english: All the pigs are slaughtered at about 90 kg liveweight.
sentences.chinese: 所有的猪在活重达90公斤左右时宰杀。

sentences.english: Per capita, Europeans and North Americans waste between 95 and 115 kilograms of food.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和北美两地区人均浪费95到115公斤食物。

sentences.english: They distinguished themselves by raising 180 kg of ginned cotton per mu last year.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们取得了亩产皮棉180公斤的优异成绩。

sentences.english: Do I have to pay excess baggage charges, if it is over 15kg?
sentences.chinese: 如果超过15公斤，我得付行李超重费吗？

definition: catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g
Chinese unit of weight equal to 0.5 kg
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
